channel.title: The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy on SWIEST - Transcripts ¬∑ Screenplays ¬∑ Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy on SWIEST - Transcripts ¬∑ Screenplays ¬∑ Lyrics

item.title: Ryan Tubridy | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Ryan Tubridy was my guest on the Season 1 finale of The Laughs of Your Life. Four years and eight seasons later, I think it‚Äôs safe to say that A LOT has changed for Virgin Radio UK‚Äôs brand new presenter. Which is why I asked him to come back as my Season 9 finale guest. He talked to me about running out of juice as the host of the Late Late show, his taxi ride to the Oireachtas Hearing, and the joys of being a ghost in London.

item.title: Eoin McGee | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description You might have seen him on Instagram or his RT√â TV shows divvying out money advice - Eoin McGee is the financial planner who has been on a mission to teach Irish people How to Be Good With Money and it was great fun to have him as my guest on today's show! He chatted to me about surviving the life-threatening fall that left him with a brain bleed, how he and his brothers honoured his Dad‚Äôs memory with a special glass of whiskey, and the first memory of laughter that involved him pissing on his friend‚Äôs head!

item.title: Pat Spillane | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description From his appearances on the Sunday Game before his recent retirement, Pat Spillane became a voice and face of Irish life as familiar as Bosco or Anne Doyle! But he's much more than the crank on the couch as I came to find out. He talked to me about growing up with a pub as a playground, the mountain he had to climb to woo his wife Rosarii, and how he has managed to live his entire life without having to cook, clean, or change a nappy.

item.title: Donal Skehan | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description From pop stardom, to food blogger, to celebrity chef and food author, Donal Skehan has had a *very* interesting career arc. He and I crossed paths about a year ago in slightly unexpected circumstances, and it was great fun to chat about that. We also chatted about the Barbie doll that came between him and his brother John, a recent dark time in his life, and getting his own back on Dustin the Turkey, amongst many other things.

item.title: Mary Lou McDonald | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Not for the first time on The Laughs of Your Life, I come face to face with a politician who I do an impression of! Mary Lou McDonald wasted no time in bringing that up, but she's a good sport, as well as being a fascinating guest, who I've been very keen to have on the podcast for a while. She talked to me about the failed hair glow-up that left her looking like Bosco, her unusual approach to stress relief, and where she thinks her political career could go.

item.title: Arthur Gourounlian | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Having had the pleasure of working alongside him on Dancing With The Stars, I knew Arthur Gourounlian had an incredible life story to tell. From having to flee the war in Armenia with his family at the age of 12, to creating a new life and identity for himself through dancing in Europe, to coming out to his mother, and the death threats he received from his own family about his marriage to Brian Dowling.

item.title: Rob Kearney | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Delighted to have legend of Irish rugby Rob Kearney joining me on today‚Äôs show. Now it goes without saying, for the past few weeks we‚Äôve had dreams of celebrating an Irish World Cup victory with Rob in studio. Those dreams were shattered but that‚Äôs not Rob‚Äôs fault, he smashed it with his TV coverage! Go Rob! We chatted about dealing with bullying in national school, surviving two-weeks of quarantine in Australia with his wife, Jess, and, Rob gives us the boldest Last Laugh we‚Äôve ever had.

item.title: India Sasha | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description When I joined TikTok the first person who caught my eye was my guest on today's episode. India Sasha's bio describes her as the ‚ÄòCEO of One Hand Humour‚Äô and she is without question one of the brightest and bubbliest stars of Irish TikTok right now. We chatted about growing up in Belfast and how that means seeing riots as ‚Äònormal‚Äô and a chance to get off school early, her family‚Äôs unique sense of humour which helped her to deal with being born with one hand, and of course, *that* superviral Rock/Paper/Scissors video.

item.title: Anne Doyle | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Well now, it's not every day you have Irish broadcasting royalty in the building. So naturally, I had to down and curtsy to the legend that is my guest on today‚Äôs pod - HRH Anne Doyle. We chatted about her ultimate cocktail of choice, why broadcasting to the nation was actually one of the loneliest feelings she has ever experience and she also told me about the incident in a Cuban hotel that showed her why it‚Äôs never a good idea to leave a party early!

item.title: Kate Lawler | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description BIG BROTHER ROYALTYüëë In the same month that BB returns to our TV screens on ITV, what a privilege to chat to the icon that is Kate Lawler. From winning Big Brother in 2002 (21 years ago!!!), to making people laugh with her hilarious update on Instagram, to her openness and honesty around her experience of post natal depression... Kate has always been and will always be a JOY ‚ù§Ô∏è I absolutely loved my chat with her and I hope you do, too!

item.title: I'm Grand Mam (PJ and Kevin) | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I always say it‚Äôs such a pleasure to interview fellow podcasters because they just get it. That's why I‚Äôm so delighted that my guests this week are the lads from I‚Äôm Grand Mam - PJ Kirby and Kevin Twomey. We chatted about how their friendship was formed via big nights out in London, PJ‚Äôs ill-fated Chaka Khan music video, and Kevin remembers how his late dad, became his biggest cheerleader after he came out.

item.title: Spencer Matthews | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description We are back and kicking off our 9th season with a bang! You may know him as a star of Made in Chelsea, you may know him as an adventurer, an entrepreneur, or one half of Spencer and Vogue. Yes Spencer Matthews is my first guest this season. We chatted about his first reality TV contract and his hilarious/ludicrous demands, why his approach to parenting is so different from his father's, and getting his ‚Äòslobbery mess‚Äô first shift on St.

item.title: Jennifer Zamparelli | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Our last show of this season and it's the final episode, a final reminder that tix are available for The Laughs of Your Life LIVE at the Bord G√°is Energy Theatre on Wednesday, 12th of April, 2023! Pick them up on bordgaisenergytheatre.ie and ticketmaster.ie. And I'm delighted to be finishing up this season with a bang! I was delighted to welcome to the studio, my soon to be Dancing With The Stars co-host, the one only Jennifer Zamparelli.

item.title: Pauline McLynn | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description ****Tix available for The Laughs of Your Life LIVE at the Bord G√°is Energy Theatre on Wednesday, 12th of April, 2023! One date already sold out, I can't wait to meet you all there ‚ù§Ô∏è**** Pauline McLynn is a 100% National Treasure Irish actress, famous for her roles in Father Ted, Shameless and now she's coming to a new SKY Comedy show called Rosie Molloy Gives Up Everything that also stars Ardal O‚ÄôHanlon (reunited!

item.title: Richard Chambers | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description ****Tickets for The Laughs of Your Life LIVE at the Bord G√°is Energy Theatre on Wednesday, 12th of April, 2023 are on sale now! One date already sold out, I can't wait to meet you all there ‚ù§Ô∏è**** Richard Chambers is one of the country‚Äôs best known news journalists, but it‚Äôs not just on Virgin Media news where he keeps us up to date, his tweets are essential if you wanna keep your finger on the pulse.

item.title: Niall Quinn | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description ****Tickets for The Laughs of Your Life LIVE at the Bord G√°is Energy Theatre on Wednesday, 12th of April, 2023 are on sale now! One date already sold out, I can't wait to meet you all there ‚ù§Ô∏è**** My guest on today's show is Niall Quinn who Irish people love for the famous goals he scored for the Ireland football team. But there‚Äôs so much more to Niall and I was delighted to have him into the studio to chat about many things including how his dad, a true hurling man, didn‚Äôt think much of his soccer achievements; what he was surprised to find he had left behind the bar in Keheoe‚Äôs pub; and how he followed through on a 40 year old promise to his mum.

item.title: Pamela Joyce | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description ****Tickets for The Laughs of Your Life LIVE at the Bord G√°is Energy Theatre on Wednesday, 12th of April, 2023 are on sale now! One date already sold out, I can't wait to meet you all there ‚ù§Ô∏è**** My guest on today's show is incredibly funny, she‚Äôs incredibly sound, we get on like a house on fire; and it was my pure pleasure to have Galway boeur, Pamela Joyce in studio!

item.title: Giovanna Fletcher | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description ****Tickets for The Laughs of Your Life LIVE at the Bord G√°is Energy Theatre on Wednesday, 12th of April, 2023 are on sale now! One date already sold out, I can't wait to meet you all there ‚ù§Ô∏è**** On today's show, I was delighted to welcome into the studio I‚Äôm a Celeb WINNER, Giovanna Fletcher! We chatted about Whatsapping Kate Middleton, the night she literally broke a leg onstage, and and how she landed into Ireland on the most Irish day possible.

item.title: Louis Walsh | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Louis Walsh and I met at a Junk Kouture event and we just *clicked*. He gave me his number at the time and he promised he'd do the podcast. Well, lo and behold, Louis is a man of his word! I was so pleased to welcome the undisputed godfather of Irish pop music onto today's show. We chatted about the X-Factor gossip we never knew we needed, his first memory of a young Stephen Gately, and the daily craic he still has with Simon Cowell.

item.title: Claire Byrne | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Claire Byrne is RT√â's current affairs presenting queen. She's another guest who I have been dying to have in for ages and I was chuffed when she told me a couple of weeks ago that was available to come in. We chatted about, her ultimate midnight feast (with added D‚ÄôUnbelievables on VHS, her Netflix binge-fest guilty pleasure, and what she misses about CB Live which she gave up earlier this year.

item.title: Louise O'Neill | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I was so delighted to finally welcome Louise O‚ÄôNeill to the studio this week because, like many of my guests, we've been trying to line it up for a while. I really admire Louise's work, her new book Idol is fab and she's part of a golden generation of amazing young female authors. I love that. We chatted about how therapy helped her overcome her eating disorder, the actual riot that is attending a Joanne McNally comedy gig, and why people think her dog hates men!

item.title: Aoife Moore | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I was delighted to welcome onto the show a journalist I've admired for a long time, not just for her amazing work on the GolfGate scoop, but also for her no bullshit approach to social media. Love that. We chatted about her being 'divorced dad kryptonite' LOL, how she burned a lot of bridges over GolfGate, and why Beyonc√© could be considered a Republican hero... I‚Äôm delighted that this season of The Laughs of your Life is once again brought to you by F&F, fashion at Tesco.

item.title: Greg O'Shea | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Presenter, rugby player and Love Island winner, Greg O'Shea is my guest on today's show. Trigger warning: I am so grateful to Greg for his honesty in our chat. I truly believe what he has to say about asking for help when he encountered his own mental health struggles will be massively helpful to many people, particularly men, but it is important to note this conversation involves discussion about suicidal feelings.

item.title: Roz Purcell | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Weüëèareüëèbacküëè! And I'm absolutely delighted to welcome a woman we've been angling to get into the Laughs of Your Life studio since forever. Roz Purcell has had an incredible career to date - Top 10 Miss Universe model at 19, then went on to become the powerhouse behind Natural Born Feeder and The Hike Life. She's a proper boss bitch! We chatted about her hilarious first ever modelling head shots taken as a 15-year-old at her granduncle‚Äôs Golden Jubliee as a priest, how she developed and then overcame her eating disorder, and how she and her sister are lucky to be alive after an awful M50 car crash.

item.title: The Garrihy Sisters | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description In the *season finale* I‚Äôm welcoming back two familiar voices‚Ä¶ As regular listeners will know, they‚Äôve been guests on the podcast before, but it‚Äôs been a wild few years for all of us‚Ä¶so it‚Äôs time for a catch up. It's the best sisters a gal could have! Aoibh√≠n and Ailbhe Garrihy! We chatted about the Garrihy lockdown baby boom, the Irish food that brought life-sized teddy bear, our dad Eugene Garrihy to tears of joy and we looked forward to the laughs to come as The Laughs of Your Life gets ready to head off on its summer holidays!

item.title: Danny O'Reilly | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I've always been an admirer of Danny O‚ÄôReilly; he's in one of the biggest bands in Ireland but he always come across as such a sound guy. It was great to have him in for natter about playing GAA in London (and how that helped him get gigs!), how he answers people who question why they aren‚Äôt bigger outside Ireland, and why he used to deny that Mary Black was his mam.

item.title: Amy DeBhr√∫n | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I loved chatting with Amy De Bhr√∫n, who you'll know from Line of Duty (that incredible Scouse accent and she's from Dublin!). Amy is one of five sisters, and we chatted about the sanitary towel downpours in her home (her poor mother!), why getting Line of Duty was different to getting any other job, and how her sister‚Äôs cancer diagnosis changed their family I‚Äôm delighted to tell you that this season of the Laughs of your Life is brought to you by F&F, fashion at Tesco.

item.title: Dr. Alex George | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I have to say that Dr. Alex is one of the all-time Love Island faves so I was so really pleased to welcome him onto the show as my guest this week. We had a great chinwag including chats about shit London GUINNESS, how he‚Äôs honouring his brother‚Äôs memory and, *of course*, there was plenty of Love Island goss, too! I‚Äôm delighted to tell you that this season of the Laughs of your Life is brought to you by F&F, fashion at Tesco.

item.title: Jacqui Hurley | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Jacqui Hurley, the new presenter of rugby on RT√â TV and all-round sports journalist boss, is my guest on the podcast this week. In a very honest chat, she spoke to me about why she almost quit RT√â after missing out on her dream presenter job, how she and her family had to rebuild their lives after the tragic death of her younger brother and that one phrase that sets everyone off in the Whatsapp group.

item.title: Michael Bubl√© | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description *Pinch me* but... Michael Bubl√©, yes the Michael Bubl√©(!), dropped into for a chat on the pod this week. We met in a five star Dublin hotel and had a fecking great chat about so many things including... punching above his weight with his beautiful wife Luisana, how he lived out his very own Julia Roberts 'Pretty Woman' moment and he also gave us arguably the *best* worst joke we've heard on the pod so far.

item.title: Amy Huberman | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description We've been trying to line this up for a *long* time, so I was delighted to finally welcome multi-award winning actor and all-round Irish acting royalty, Amy Huberman, into studio as my guest on the podcast this week. We chatted about why a plane to New Zealand isn‚Äôt a great place to get food poisoning; how, even in illness, her dad loves to laugh; and... the first shift with Brian.

item.title: Miche√°l Martin | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I was delighted, and also, I'm not gonna lie, a little stunned that An Taoiseach, yes the leader of the country, Miche√°l Martin is my guest on the podcast this week! We chatted about many things including, of course, his son, Miche√°l Aodh, being a bit of a looker; why he‚Äôs stone mad for sea swimming; and also, because I couldn't have him sitting in front of me and not ask, what he's going to do to fix the housing crisis in Ireland.

item.title: Ellen Keane | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I was delighted to welcome Irish paralympic gold medalist and Dancing With The Stars goddess, Ellen Keane, onto the podcast this week. It was a *very* lively chat, we shot the breeze about her Brazilian thong awkwardness at the age of twelve, and, OH MY GOD, the *funniest* jacuzzi story you will ever hear. She also spoke to about learning to cope with her depression and the lessons she has learned about managing her mental health.

item.title: Nicola Tallant | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description I was so excited to meet Sunday World crime journalist, Nicola Tallant, the creator of one of my *favourite* podcasts of 2021 - the phenomenal The Witness: In His Own Words. In a really interesting conversation full of hair-raising insights on the crime world in Ireland, we chatted about how Veronica Guerin‚Äôs death changed everything, why Irish people are funding a new generation of homegrown Cocaine billionaires and, also, a hilarious story about exploding Tr√≥caire boxes (!

item.title: Marty Guilfoyle | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Amazing to have me oul pal, Marty Guilfoyle as my next guest on The Laughs Of Your Life podcast. We covered LOTS‚Ä¶ reminisced on the Spin days (of course), he described what it‚Äôs like to experience the full force of a social media pile-on (spoiler: it‚Äôs not at all fun) and he explained the gas reason why he‚Äôs given up being a vegetarian. A chat with Marto is always good for the soul.

item.title: Aisling Bea | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description Our first guest this season is the Bea-rilliant‚Ä¶ Aisling Bea. Aisling has been on my dream guest list since the get go! Chatting to her was like chatting to an old school pal. We covered‚Ä¶growing up in Kildare, the period/boob train (it‚Äôll all make sense üöÇ) and refusing to learn the ‚Äúmen speak before women‚Äù rule in comedy. This season of The Laughs Of Your Life podcast is brought to you by F&F Clothing available at Tesco.

item.title: Robert Sheehan | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description The Laughs of your Life is a podcast with Doireann Garrihy at the helm. In this series, Doireann aims to delve into the beauty of having a laugh, speaking to guests from all walks of life. From first memories of laughter to being laughed at to ‚Äúif I didn‚Äôt laugh I‚Äôd cry‚Äù moments, these markers will shape the interviews, bringing out the best in some of Ireland‚Äôs most influential people.

item.title: Christy Dignam | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy

item.title: Michael Fry | The Laughs Of Your Life with Doireann Garrihy
item.description: Podcast Description The Laughs of your Life is a podcast with Doireann Garrihy at the helm. In this series, Doireann aims to delve into the beauty of having a laugh, speaking to guests from all walks of life. From first memories of laughter to being laughed at to “if I didn't laugh I'd cry” moments, these markers will shape the interviews, bringing out the best in some of Ireland's most influential people.
